answerText: Higgs boson[10] Higgs bosons are formed by the Higgs mechanism which explains why this occurrence in the electroweak gauge group doesn't result in massless Goldstone bosons.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Minnesota A  | 18 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This particle is conjectured to be responsible for mass. For 10 points each: [10] Name this object called "the God particle."
